entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5 except zero in a few localities.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5 except zero in a few localities. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
